txt.en: Bring the Mordor steel to Adbert
Adbert can be found at the northern-most watch-tower in the Wold.\n\nYou should bring the Mordor steel you found to the watchman and see what he makes of it.
The Easterlings at the South Undeep bear the steel of Mordor, and are clearly allies of the Enemy.
'This steel bears marks of Mordor! That does not bode well. I will have this sent to the Thane at once, [placeholder].'
The Easterlings at the South Undeep bear the steel of Mordor, and are clearly allies of the Enemy.
Find Mordor steel on the Easterlings
The Easterlings at the South Undeep bear the steel of Mordor, and are clearly allies of the Enemy.
Find Mordor steel on the Easterlings ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Mordor steel can be found on the Easterlings who are attempting to invade the Wold by way of the South Undeep.\n\nYou should collect Mordor steel to show to the Thane.
